Industrial And Laboratory Solution

Lab to GMP Freeze Drying Systems

We design and manufacture laboratory, pilot, and GMP pharmaceutical freeze dryers, as well as commercial freeze drying systems for food and biotech industries. Engineered for precision temperature control, stable vacuum performance, and validated process reliability.

Company Introduction

Founded: 2014

Headquarters: Ningbo, China

Certifications: ISO 9001, CE, GMP-friendly engineering

We design and manufacture lab, pilot, and GMP freeze dryers, thermostatic baths, and process equipment for global pharmaceutical, biotech, and analytical industries.
